website_summaries.verdict: This case should protect the iPhone against light to moderate use, but for more extreme protection, consider the Tough Armor.
pros: The outer shell is hard plastic with a soft TPU inner shell, providing good shock absorption
The cover is also easy to grip
cons: Openings may be too small for some users, and the outer shell may crack if the phone is dropped

customer_reviews.title: This case is a dirt absorberrrrr it is a nice case. However it gets dirty sooo fast I ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is a dirt absorberrrrr it is a nice case. However it gets dirty sooo fast I had to put it away in 3 days but if you have a wipe and are willing to clean and clean then it's for you
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: I bought this case for my daughter and they love the bright colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my daughter and they love the bright colors, that's for sure. I like the rubbery feel and the thickness. For me I would prefer slimmer and sleeker, but for my young daughter, the extra grip and the extra protection is just what I was looking for. Depends on what a person is looking for as far as phone covers/cases, but this one is well made and I definitely recommend it for someone that may need that extra protection without spending a large amount of money for an Otter Box case or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Strong and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my new iPhone. It lasted quite some time however it got dirty pretty fast and I had to get a new one. The mix of rubber and plastic really protected my phone. I tend to drop it a lot so I was really glad I picked this one. Got a lot of compliments on the colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. The one downside is that the white ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this case for months now and it still strong. It protects my phone well and it's slim enough to fit on my back pocket. Great quality. The one downside is that the white part is very dirty due to long term use but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Valentim-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: so that was nice. It's a good product I'm just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Silicone sleeve doesn't fit as snugly as I hoped. Outer shell seems almost too small, there's some gaps by the button cut outs. Overall, the color was true (I bought the mint green and light gray) and the product does what it's supposed to do. It did come with a screen protector that I wasn't expecting, so that was nice. It's a good product I'm just a little disappointed in the size and fit of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Immelt-Kordas

customer_reviews.title: I like this case so much
customer_reviews.text: I like this case so much . It is soft and the button is easy to press. When I put it inside my jean pocket it doesn't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Hally Young

customer_reviews.title: Stylist and Protective!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time buying this product and I LOVE it. It looks good and protects my phone. Believe me I am clumsy too. The one thing I would complain about is that it gets very dirty. Other than that its the best case I have had my phone in!
customer_reviews.author: Jen from NM

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product, but after only one week the color was completely ruined by normal daily activity. It was made very well, so far no problems with the plastic, but I was very disappointed with the color of the main plastic. It has turned very dark and gray after only a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny

customer_reviews.title: Advertised to fit the iPhone 6 but is a few milimeters off and is too loose.

I recommend this case!

customer_reviews.title: Hard case plastic cover too thin
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this case received it two days ago on june 2nd today june 4th i accidentally dropped my phone from less than a feet, from my sofa to the floor and the hard case cover broke, the plastic of the hard case is very thin, the rubber part did protected my phone from the fall but the hard case on the outside broke, i am unsatisfied with the quality of this product! I hope I either get a new one or a refund, it broke too easily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a basic case.
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for me. The colors in the pictures match up with the real product and it comes in two pieces. The gray rubber piece is very flimsy but the outer rubber piece makes up for this. As far as protection goes, this case is sturdy enough to protect your phone from minor dings and bumps. I totally reccomend this case if youre just looking for a basic case with minor protection.

product_meta.title: iPhone 6s Case, iPhone 6 Case, Lumsing Hybrid High Impact Dual Layer Armor Defender Cases Protective Cover for Apple iPhone 6/6s (Mint Green-Grey)
product_meta.description:
Lumsing (TM) has always devoted itself to providing fashion and superior products with the end-users, so that you could enjoy the leisure shopping experience at the same time. Moreover, we have been working hard to seek out various funny products together with unique customer service, to make the customers gain more happiness. 

Product Features: 
1. Perfectly fashionably design for Apple iPhone 6/6s (4.7 inch Screen),easy to install,protect your beloved phone from damage 
2. Allows access to all buttons and ports for charging and syncing 
3. Lightweight design perfectly fits your phone, does not make your phone look bulky 
4. You will find it much easier to wipe the dust off this case than you have experienced from other cases 
Compatible 
Apple iPhone 6 (4.7 inch Screen) 

Package included 
1 x Masione case for Apple iPhone 6/6s (4.7 inch Screen) 
1 x High clarity premium screen protector for Apple iPhone 6/6s (4.7 inch Screen) 
1 x Cleaning cloth 
1 x Application 
Accessory only. Phone not included. 

This product is sold exclusively by ATC LLC. Only buy from ATC LLC to get genuine Lumsing(TM) products with manufacturer warranty and superb customer service.
feature_bullets: Specifically designed for the apple iphone 6/6s 4.7 inch ( will not fit any other phones)
Double Protection: hard plastic case outside and soft rubber gel silicone skin inside
Perfect fit and easy access to all ports, sensors, speakers, cameras
Super comfortable hand feeling and quality guarantee
